code: @Test public void testSimpleDirect() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:bar").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").to("direct:foo").to("direct:bar").to("mock:result").     from("direct:foo").to("mock:foo").     from("direct:bar").to("mock:bar"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("direct:foo").to("direct:bar").to("mock:result").             from("direct:foo").to("mock:foo").             from("direct:bar").to("mock:bar").         }     }. }
